name: Stealthy
text: You are good at avoiding unwanted attention and slipping out of bonds.
benefit: You get a +2 bonus on all Escape Artist and Stealth skill checks. If you have 10 or more ranks in one of these skills, the bonus increases to +4 for that skill.
mythicText: Your grace and fluidity are beyond compare.
mythicBenefit: The bonus on Escape Artist and Stealth skill checks from Stealthy increases by 2. In addition, you can expend one use of mythic power to treat an Escape Artist or Stealth check as if you had rolled a natural 20. You must decide to use this ability before making the roll.
text_zh: 你对避开不必要的注意和逃脱束缚很拿手。
benefit_zh: 你在所有脱逃和隐匿技能检定上获得+2加值。如果某技能受训等级10以上，该技能获得的加值提升为+4。
